ch0187_00_sina/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on, let’s go out and search for some new
encounters!
ch0187_00_sina/7101_0701_01_10: I hear you know Serena and her friends.
ch0187_00_sina/7101_0701_02_10: I’m actually kind of like a mentor to them.
ch0187_00_sina/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m so happy to see all my protégés hard at work
here on Pasio, too.
ch0187_00_sina/7102_0701_01_10:
Have you met my Trainer friend already? His name
is Dexio.
ch0187_00_sina/7102_0701_02_10:
He can be a little unreliable sometimes, but when
it comes to Pokémon battles, his true talent shines.
ch0187_00_sina/7102_0701_03_10:
I trust him and am proud to have a partner like
him beside me!
ch0187_00_sina/7103_0701_01_10:
You know what I’ve realized since coming to
Pasio?
ch0187_00_sina/7103_0701_02_10: The world is filled with beautiful Trainers...
ch0187_00_sina/7103_0701_03_10: but I, Sina, am the most beautiful of them all!
ch0187_00_sina/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re training a Pokémon, it’s important to
understand everything you can about it.
ch0187_00_sina/7104_0701_02_10:
Even if they’re the same species, the strengths and
natures of individual Pokémon can be really
different, you know?
ch0187_00_sina/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s why you need to change your approach for
each Pokémon you raise!
ch0187_00_sina/7105_0701_01_10: Dexio and I work so well together!
ch0187_00_sina/7105_0701_02_10:
But battles on Pasio are typically fought in teams
of three...
ch0187_00_sina/7105_0701_03_10:
I know! You should team up with the two of us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0187_00_sina/7105_0701_04_10: We’ll make the strongest, most beautiful team!
ch0187_00_sina/1701_0701_01_10: Stop right there! Take this with you.
ch0187_00_sina/1701_0702_01_10:
Here’s a little show of my support. Keep up the
good work!
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0701_01_10:
During a Pokémon battle, what would you say is
most important?
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0701_02_10: I’d say...trying new things, of course!
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0701_03_10:
After all, you can’t grow just by doing the same
thing over and over. Plus, it’s no fun!
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0702_01_10:
You know, I’m quite impressed with how you
keep taking on challenges.
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0702_02_10:
Pasio is filled with fierce adversaries, and yet you
keep pushing forward... It’s beautiful to see!
ch0187_00_sina/2501_0702_03_10: I know you’ll shine bright! In fact, I guarantee it!
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0701_01_10:
Helping out new Trainers reminds me of my days
traveling around Kalos.
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0701_02_10:
You know, I also used to trek all over the place
with a Pokédex in hand.
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0701_03_10:
In those days, I learned so many new things every
day... It was so much fun!
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0702_01_10: Do you have a little time to spare right now?
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0702_02_10:
Thinking back on old times is making me want to
battle!
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0702_03_10:
More importantly, I can’t afford to be shown up
by my protégés!
ch0187_00_sina/2511_0702_04_10:
I’ll call Dexio over, and the three of us can do
some special, top-secret training!
ch0187_00_sina/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you have breakfast yet? If not, let’s eat
together!
ch0187_00_sina/3003_0701_01_10:
Oh, good afternoon. Come talk to me when you
want to train.
ch0187_00_sina/3005_0701_01_10:
One mustn’t stay up late if they want to maintain
their beauty.
